caption: At the beginning of the video, a group of blue-skinned aliens are holding a meeting where their leader is giving a passionate speech from a raised platform, boosting the confidence of his tribe members. The speech seems to be effective, as the tribespeople are inspired to take up arms, mount their beasts, and appear ready to head into battle. Meanwhile, in the human camp, a man who looks like an officer is also delivering a speech to human soldiers in the barracks. Unlike the aliens, the human soldiers don't show much reaction. Later, in private conversations among a few soldiers, it's revealed that they have some complaints about the general and their desire for war is not as intense as that of the aliens.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
global.answer: No it isn't, it looks like a science fiction movie.
